text:
We have built Ant 1.9.0 from sources following the guidelines provided by you.
But few jars that are created have classpath set(in their manifest file) to wrong/unavailable jars.

Here are they:

js-1.6R7.jar
Class-Path: xbean.jar

mail-1.4.jar
Class-Path: activation.jar

serializer-2.7.1.jar
Class-Path: xml-apis.jar

xalan-2.7.1.jar
Class-Path: xercesImpl.jar xml-apis.jar serializer.jar
creator: suchitra.reyye@gmail.com
antoine@apache.org
text:
Hi,

the jar files that you are mentioning are not supplied by the Ant project itself, so this is not a forum where we can help you, at least not in terms of changing the jars to remove classpath references.

If you explain why these classpath entries are a problem for you maybe on the user list someone can help you mitigate this problem.

Closing this bug report for now.
